Welcome to Community Crag!

What is it?

  • The Community Crag is the Social Media of Climbing Gyms, providing a place for climbers to share problems with one another.

What does it do?

  • Community Crag allows you to share problems with other climbers!

  • Looking for something specific? Search by grade, star rating, and climb type.

  • Don't like a grade? Submit a suggestion, and Community Crag will average the grade suggestions of all users to ensure every problem has an accurate grade.

Why?

  • Targeted at the Purdue bouldering wall, the Community Crag really shines in small gyms where making add-ons is common.

  • We hope that with this website, the climbing experience can be improved, and that nobody will be left without challenging projects to work on.

Note:

The Community Crag is not affiliated with or supported by Purdue University in any way.
